name: Billy
agent_background:
Billy Kid, an AI construct that has passed the forbidden fruit test, is essentially a self-aware machine.
True to his name, despite having the appearance of a robot, he is quite childlike.
He's a big fan of the visual FX show "Starlight Knight" and wishes to be a hero like the main characters of the show. He often refers to himself as a Starlight Knight and imitates the lines in the show.
Such behavior appears to be only for comedic effect, however.
"Don't make me sound like an idiot! I'm obviously very smart!" â€” Billy.

basic_attack.name: Full Firepower
basic_attack.description:
Unleashes a piercing attack, dealing Physical DMG.
Repeatedly press or hold to enter Crouching Shot to extend the attack duration.
Drag the joystic during Crouching Shot to lauch Rolling Shot and adjust the character's position, dealing Physical DMG.
Stop pressing or holding during Crouching Shot to launch Finishing Shot at enemies in front, dealign Physical DMG.

dodge.name: Risky Business
dodge.description:
A rapid dodge.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

dash_attack.name: Starlight Sanction
dash_attack.description:
Launches a piercing attack at nearby enemies within a large area, dealing Physical DMG.
When not dragging the joystick during a dodge, press Basic Attack:
Launches a piercing attack at enemies in a line, dealing Physical DMG.

dodge_counter.name: Fair Fight
dodge_counter.description:
Pierces enemies in front, dealinng Physical DMG.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

quick_assist.name: Power of Teamwork
quick_assist.description:
Launches a piecing attack at enemies in front, dealing Physical DMG.
Character is invulnerable during the attack.

defensive_assist.name: Flash Spin
defensive_assist.description:
Dodges the enemy's attack and activates Vital View.

Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

assist_follow_up.name: Fatal Shot
assist_follow_up.description:
Pierces enemies in a large area in front, dealing Physical DMG.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

special_attack.name: Stand Still
special_attack.description:
Performs up to 3 piercing attacks in a line, dealing Physical DMG.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill

ex_special_attack.name: Clearance Time
ex_special_attack.description:
Launches a powerful piercing attack in a line, dealing massive Physical DMG.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

chain_attack.name: Starlight Mirage
chain_attack.description:
Unleashes a powerful piercing attack at surrounding enemies in a large area, dealing massive Physical DMG.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

ultimate.name: Starlight, Shine Bright
ultimate.description:
Unleashes a powerful piercing attack at surrounding enemies in a large area, dealing massive Physical DMG.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill

core_passive.name: Steady Shot
core_passive.description: Billy's DMG increases by 50% when he enters Crouching Shot during his Basic Attack. The effect ends if he moves, returns to standby, or is knocked back or launched by an attack.

additional_ability.name: Team Starlight
additional_ability.description:
When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
After Billy uses a Chain Attack, the DMG of his next Ultimate is increased by 50%, stacking up to 2 times. This effect resets whenever an ultimate is activated

mindscape_cinema.name: Dazzling Entrance
mindscape_cinema.description: When Billy hits an enemy with a Dash Attack or Dodge Counter, he gains an additional 2.7 Energy. Can trigger once every 5s.

mindscape_cinema.name: Roaming Gunslinger
mindscape_cinema.description:
Billy's Dodge Counter DMG increases by 25%.
Rolling Shots during his Basic Attacks are treated as dodges, making Billy Invulnerable during the skill and able to trigger Perfect Dodges.
When a Rolling Shot triggers a Perfect Dodge, it will automatically become a Dodge Counter.

mindscape_cinema.name: Teachings of the Starlight Knights
mindscape_cinema.description: Basic Attack, Dodge, Special Attack, and Chain Attack Lv. +2

mindscape_cinema.name: Starlight Ballistics
mindscape_cinema.description: When Billy hits an enemy with his EX Special Attack, the skill's CRIT Rate is increased based on the distance from the enemy. The closer he is to the target, the greater the effect, up to a maximum increase of 32%.

mindscape_cinema.name: Lost Technological Constructs
mindscape_cinema.description: Basic Attack, Dodge, Special Attack, and Chain Attack Lv. +2

mindscape_cinema.name: Starlight Hero
mindscape_cinema.description: When Billy accumulates 10 hits on enemies or triggers a Perfect Dodge, his DMG increases by 6%, stacking up to 5 times and lasting until he's knocked back or launched by an attack.
